sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCartContext } from '../context/CartContext'; import products from '../data/products.json'; import formatCurrency from '../utilities/CurrenyFormartor'; import './Cart.css' function Cart() { const { cartItems, increaseCartItem, decreaseCartItem, removeCartItem } = useCartContext() return (
Continue Shopping
{ cartItems.length === 0 ?
Your Cart is Empty
: <>
{cartItems.map(i =>
cur.id === i.id).imgUrl.split('/').slice(-2).join('/'))} alt="" />
{products.find(cur => cur.id === i.id).name}
{formatCurrency(products.find(cur => cur.id === i.id).price)}
Item total: {formatCurrency(products.find(cur => cur.id === i.id).price * i.quantity)}
{i.quantity}
)}
SUBTOTAL {formatCurrency(cartItems.reduce((acc,cur) => acc + products.find(findcur => findcur.id === cur.id).price*cur.quantity,0))}
CHECKOUT
}
); } export default Cart;
